channel.title: Timers on Security Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Timers on Security Blog

item.title: Loaded Drivers Enumeration
item.description: In this Blog I will explain my approach for solving one of the exercises from Practical Reverse Engineering Book, which is enumerating the loaded module list every 10 minutes. So after searching for the method to get all loaded Drivers on the system, I found there is an easy way you can to do it from user-mode (1) but I to do it using kernel mode driver and I want it to be stable on all windows versions.
